availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Y. Thomas Sr. (Logan Co, Ky, methodist minister and prov govt chaplain)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, methodist minister and provisional government convention chaplain. Warren County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary E. Briggs Thomas in Logan County, Kentucky, on October 1, 1854. Father of Robert Y. Thomas Jr., Kate Thomas. Methodist minister in Logan County, Kentucky, in 1860. Chaplain for the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville November 1861.

ab.bibl:
